channel.title: How do i add teleports in Emote tab?
channel.description:
How do i add teleports in Emote tab?
My emote tab has only emotes Like (dance) and more. Im using RichScape V(Project Czar Base)

item.title: How do i add teleports in Emote tab?
item.dc:creator: @jesse9294 jesse9294
item.description:
@jesse9294 wrote:

Okay lets use the Second spot as a Train telly tab. The case number for the second emote spot is Case 169.

Now to make it a Train telly we would go to Client.java and search for this;

case 169:

Once you found that delete whats under it. If you want it to become a teleport put this under it.

if (teleblock == true) { // Made by Your Name Here sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } else { customCommand("Train"); // made by Your Name Here } break;

Now That is so that if you click on it, it will take the player to your training area.

Next is getting that to say Train on the emote spot.

Save and close Client.Java

Now open TextHandler.Java

Search for p.sendFrame126(

You should see something like this

p.sendFrame126("", 180); p.sendFrame126("", 181);

Change the second line to say something like this

 p.sendFrame126("@whi@Train", 181);

now save that and close it.

Don’t forget to compile before running your server so that the update will show. (@whi@ Means it will be white by the way)

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add teleports in Emote tab?
